sections.title: Why Safe
sections.content: 100% free, no real money, no financial risk.

sections.title: Healthy Habits
sections.content: Play for fun, take breaks, manage time.

sections.title: Mental Health
sections.content: Gaming should not impact mental health.

sections.title: Account Management
sections.content: Set limits or take breaks as needed.

sections.title: Family & Friends
sections.content: Talk to loved ones if concerned.
